text: Asperjoc is a town and a former commune of the Ardèche département, in the southern part of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Vallées-d'Antraigues-Asperjoc.Arrêté préfectoral 29 October 2018 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department == References == Category:Former communes in Ardèche
title: Asperjoc
